main_definition: A possessive pronoun indicating ownership or belonging to the person being addressed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a possessive pronoun after a noun, showing that something belongs to the person being spoken to.
meanings_and_examples.example: This is my book. That one over there is yours.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A colloquial expression of intimacy or familiarity when used in informal contexts.
meanings_and_examples.example: Do you want some of this cake? It's all yours!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to express agreement, acceptance, or understanding towards something the other person has said or done.
meanings_and_examples.example: I know it can be tough, but I appreciate your effort. Yours is valuable.
